entry.tran: 有趣的;令人愉快的;惬意的
entry.def: Something that is enjoyable gives you pleasure.

means.word_mean: 愉快的,快乐的, 有乐趣的, 使人快乐的, 令人愉快的

sentences.en: We had a most enjoyable evening.
